title: Clarity and Company
description: Clarity and Company specializes in advising startups on forming strategic partnerships and joint ventures to accelerate growth. They assist in identifying and evaluating potential partners, conducting due diligence, structuring deals, and negotiating agreements. title: Phreesia Acquires MediFind, Reinforcing its Commitment to Patient-Centered Care and Expanding its Offerings to Consumers
description: Phreesia has acquired MediFind, a health technology company specializing in advanced analytics to help patients, especially those with serious or rare diseases, find expert care quickly. MediFind uses machine learning to identify top doctors based on research, patient volume, and peer recognition, categorizing them into four expertise levels. description: Genelux Corporation actively seeks strategic alliances and partnerships to advance its innovative immunotherapy technologies.
